Researchers from I-I-T Delhi, led by Doctor Meena Sharma, have demonstrated significant improvements in computational efficiency, particularly for large-scale matrices exceeding one thousand by one thousand.

unnormalised: The team focused on addressing the challenges posed by ill-conditioned matrices, often encountered in engineering simulations and data science. Their method combines iterative refinement techniques with direct factorization methods, achieving a speedup of approximately 20% compared to traditional Gaussian elimination for certain matrix structures.
